title: [Sculpture]
brief_description: Documentation of a sculptural artwork - a series of papal deathmasks, each wearing a bishop’s mitre upon which facial features are successively more corroded and obscured. The work supports a reading that the modern Church is increasingly less consistent with its initial tenets.
description: Documentation of a sculptural artwork - a series of papal deathmasks, each wearing a bishop’s mitre upon which facial features are successively more corroded and obscured. The work supports a reading that the modern Church is increasingly less consistent with its initial tenets.
